SOUTH-LAWN.name: South Lawn
SOUTH-LAWN.description: You are on a wide lawn just north of the entrance to the Robner estate. Directly north at the end of a pebbled path is the Robner house, flanked to the northeast and northwest by a vast expanse of well-kept lawn. Beyond the house can be seen the lakefront.

south.message: Leaving the estate would mean quitting the case and, most probably, your job.
